trans-unit.source: Provides properties that are used with the following events in the root <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" /> object: <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged" />, <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging" />, <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供与根 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" /> 对象中的以下事件一起使用的属性：<see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged" />、<see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging" />、<see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged" /> 和 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs> class is exposed as the `e` parameter in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs>类公开为`e`中的参数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>事件根<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>对象。

trans-unit.source: This class contains the following properties:
trans-unit.target: 此类包含以下属性：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object that the event was raised for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>属性，用于获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>为引发事件的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> property gets the name of the chart area; other chart area properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>属性获取图表区的名称; 也可以设置其他图表区属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object that the event was raised for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A>属性，用于获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>为引发事件的对象。

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of axis—X, X2, Y or Y2—use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定轴的类型-X，X2，Y 或 Y2-使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Other axis properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以设置其他轴属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> property, which represents the position of a cursor along an axis, measured as an axis value, at the time the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>属性，它表示沿 x 轴游标的位置，单位为轴值，在引发事件的时间。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> property can be used to get the position of a cursor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>属性可以用于获取光标的位置。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> event, this property can also be used to reset the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>事件，还可以使用此属性重置光标位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A> property, which represents the starting position of a range selection along an axis, measured as an axis value, at the time the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A>属性，它表示范围选择在轴的起始位置，单位为轴值，在引发事件的时间。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A> property can be used to get the selected range start position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A>可以使用属性来获取所选的范围开始位置。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> event, this property can also be used to reset the position.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>事件，还可以使用此属性来重置的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A> property, which represents the end position of a range selection along an axis, measured as an axis value, at the time the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A>属性，它表示范围选择在轴的结束位置，单位为轴值，在引发事件的时间。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A> property can be used to get the selected range end position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A>可以使用属性来获取所选的范围结束位置。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> event, this property can also be used to reset the position.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>事件，还可以使用此属性来重置的位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: 光标的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" />。

trans-unit.source: The axis of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: 光标的轴。

trans-unit.source: The new cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 新的光标位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs" /> class with the specified chart area, axis, and cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的图表区域、轴和光标位置初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: 光标的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" />。

trans-unit.source: The axis of the cursor.
trans-unit.target: 光标的轴。

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new range selection.
trans-unit.target: 新范围选的内容的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: The end position of the new range selection.
trans-unit.target: 新范围选择的结束位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs" /> class with the specified chart area, axis, start and end positions for the new range.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的图表区域、轴以及新范围的起始和结束位置初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> object that a cursor or range selection belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 获取光标或范围选择所属的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> object that represents the axis that a cursor or range selection belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis" /> 对象，该对象表示光标或范围选择所属的轴。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A> property is exposed in the following events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A>属性公开的根的下列事件中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>对象： <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to:
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以用于：

trans-unit.source: determine the type of axis—X, X2, Y or Y2—that the event is being raised for, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 确定轴的类型-X，X2，Y 或 Y2 — 事件被引发，使用的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: get and set axis properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 获取和设置轴属性，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> object that a cursor or range selection belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 获取光标或范围选择所属的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An object of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> that represents the chart area that a range selection or cursor belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea" /> 类型的对象，该对象表示范围选择或光标所属的图表区域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property is exposed in the following events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>属性公开的根的下列事件中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>对象： <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanged>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to:
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以用于：

trans-unit.source: determine which chart area the event is being raised for; this is useful to know when there are multiple chart areas within a chart image.
trans-unit.target: 确定正在; 引发该事件的图表区这是有助于你了解图表图像中的多个图表区时。

trans-unit.source: get and set chart area properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 获取和设置图表区属性，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.BackColor%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of a cursor.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置光标位置。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the event, also sets the cursor's position.
trans-unit.target: 还会根据事件设置光标的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="double" /> value that represents the position of a cursor along an axis.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="double" /> 值，表示光标沿某个轴的位置。

trans-unit.source: This property represents the new position of a cursor, and can be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged> events to get the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 此属性表示光标的新位置，并可在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>事件以获取光标位置。

trans-unit.source: It can also be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> event to set the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 此外可在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>事件设置光标位置。

trans-unit.source: Note that setting this property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> event will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，将此属性设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>事件将产生任何影响。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> property will have a value of <xref:System.Double.NaN> in this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>属性将具有的值<xref:System.Double.NaN>在这种情况。

trans-unit.source: To determine the chart area that the event is being raised for, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定正在针对引发该事件的图表区，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A> property to determine if this end position is for a range selected along the primary or secondary X or Y axis.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A>属性来确定此末尾的位置是否为范围所选沿主或辅助 X 或 Y 轴。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the end position of a selected range.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置选定范围的结束位置。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the event, also sets the end position of the range.
trans-unit.target: 还会根据事件设置该范围的结束位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="double" /> value that represents the end position of a selected range.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="double" /> 值，表示选定范围的结束位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A> property represents the new position of a cursor, and can be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged> events to get the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A>属性表示光标的新位置，并可在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>事件以获取光标位置。

trans-unit.source: It can also be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> event to set the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 此外可在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>事件设置光标位置。

trans-unit.source: Note that setting this property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging> event will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，将此属性设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.SelectionRangeChanging>事件将产生任何影响。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A> property will have a value of <xref:System.Double.NaN> in this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionEnd%2A>属性将具有的值<xref:System.Double.NaN>在这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The start position of a selected range is not necessarily less than the end position of a selected range.
trans-unit.target: 所选范围的开始位置不一定必须小于的选择范围的结束位置。

trans-unit.source: The start position is the position where the user fist clicked within the chart area, and the end position is the position of the mouse at the time the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 起始位置是鼠标的在图表区中，单击用户首，其中的结束位置是鼠标的引发事件时位置的位置。

trans-unit.source: To determine the chart area that the event is being raised for use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定图表区用于引发该事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A> property to determine if this end position is for a range selected along the primary or secondary X or Y axis.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A>属性来确定此末尾的位置是否为范围所选沿主或辅助 X 或 Y 轴。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the start position of a selected range.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置选定范围的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the event, also sets the start position of the range.
trans-unit.target: 还会根据事件设置该范围的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="double" /> value that represents the start position of a selected range.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="double" /> 值，表示选定范围的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A> property represents the new position of a cursor, and can be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged> events to get the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A>属性表示光标的新位置，并可在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanged>事件以获取光标位置。

trans-unit.source: It can also be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> event to set the cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 此外可在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>事件设置光标位置。

trans-unit.source: Note that setting this property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging> event will have no effect; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A> property will have a value of <xref:System.Double.NaN> in this event.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，将此属性设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CursorPositionChanging>事件会产生任何效果;<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.NewSelectionStart%2A>属性将具有的值<xref:System.Double.NaN>在这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The start position of a selected range is not necessarily less than the end position of a selected range.
trans-unit.target: 所选范围的开始位置不一定必须小于的选择范围的结束位置。

trans-unit.source: The start position is the position where the user fist clicked within the chart area, and the end position is the position of the mouse at the time the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 起始位置是鼠标的在图表区中，单击用户首，其中的结束位置是鼠标的引发事件时位置的位置。

trans-unit.source: To determine the chart area that the event is being raised for, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定正在针对引发该事件的图表区，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A> property to determine if this end position is for a range selected along the primary or secondary X or Y axis.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CursorEventArgs.Axis%2A>属性来确定此末尾的位置是否为范围所选沿主或辅助 X 或 Y 轴。
